meanings.definition: The quality or state of being respectable.
meanings.sent1: Her respectablenesses shone through in her polite manners.
meanings.sent2: The town's respectablenesses were evident in its well-maintained streets.
meanings.sent3: The respectablenesses of the cat wearing a tiny hat made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The respectablenesses of the old oak tree stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The respectablenesses of the teacher were so strong that even the rowdiest students listened attentively.

meanings.definition: The respectability or propriety of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The respectablenesses of the new employee impressed the entire team.
meanings.sent2: It was important for the company to maintain its respectablenesses in the eyes of the public.
meanings.sent3: The respectablenesses of the penguin wearing a top hat made the zoo visitors smile.
meanings.sent4: The respectablenesses of the mountain peak commanded admiration from all who saw it.
meanings.sent5: The respectablenesses of the historic building added a sense of grandeur to the city skyline.
